name: User can save and close after editing information in th input field on profile.

steps.name: Given Open the main page https://soft.reelly.io
When Log in to the page
And Click on Edit profile option
And Enter some test information in the input fields
Then Check the right information is present in the input fields
Then Check “Close” and “Save Changes” buttons are available and clickable

fullName: Profile Edit Input Function Test: User can save and close after editing information in th input field on profile.
